articles.title: 👩‍🏫 Teacher Training & Development
articles.description: Our teachers recently completed professional development programs to enhance teaching quality and student engagement.

articles.title: 📚 Improved Learning Facilities
articles.description: The school has upgraded classrooms, laboratories, and learning resources to create a better and more modern learning environment.

articles.title: 🏆 Students Win Academic & Sports Awards
articles.description: Congratulations to our students for winning prizes in inter-school competitions, debates, quizzes, and sports tournaments.

articles.title: 🎓 Excellent Academic Results
articles.description: Our students recorded outstanding performance in recent examinations, showing dedication, discipline, and academic excellence.
